thread.title: Air Macau To Decrease Fuel SurchargesTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Air Macau To Decrease Fuel SurchargesTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Air Macau To Decrease Fuel SurchargesTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Air Macau To Decrease Fuel Surcharges
Air Macau will decrease fuel surcharges from USD30 per flight sector to USD28 per flight sector from 01st September 2015.
All tickets issued on/after 01st September 2015 (inclusive) for travel from
Macau to Mainland China, Taiwan, Thailand, Japan, Korea and Vietnam will be subjected to new fuel surcharges. Same fuel surcharge level applies to adult, child and infant fares.
Air Macau thanks for the attention and supports from all passengers and travel agencies.
Source:- Air Macau
